pyphoon

  • pyphoon.db

pyphoon.db¶

This class provides various tools to build up and manage a database with Digital Typhoon data. To get familiar, you may want to have a look at the example here.

pyphoon.db.pd_manager¶

class pyphoon.db.pd_manager.PDManager(compression='gzip')¶

Bases: object

Class to manage and help in the analysis of the dataset. It stores references to the image files, dates of the data, corrected images etc. in pandas.DataFrame objects.

besttrack = None¶

DataFrame for best track data.

images = None¶

DataFrame for original image data.

missing = None¶

DataFrame for missing image data.

corrupted = None¶

DataFrame for corrected image data.

add_orig_images(images_dir, file_refs_only=True)¶

Adds information about original images to the class attribute images.

Parameters:
  • images_dir (str) – Path to image dataset
  • file_refs_only (bool, default True) – Set to True to only store links to the files ( recommended. Otherwise it reads and stores the image files as well.
save_images(filename)¶

Saves the class attribute images as a pickle file.

Parameters:filename (str) – Path to the pickle file.
load_orig_images(filename)¶

Loads the image data from a pickle file as DataFrame storing it as the class attribute images.

Parameters:filename (str) – Path to the pickle file.
add_besttrack(directory)¶

Adds information from the best data to the class attribute besttrack.

Parameters:directory – Path where source files are stored
Returns:

Saves the class attribute besttrack as a pickle file.

Parameters:filename (str) – Path to the pickle file.

Loads the best data from a pickle file as DataFrame storing it as the class attribute besttrack.

Parameters:filename (str) – Path to the pickle file.

Adds information about the corrected images to the class attribute corrupted.

Parameters:
  • images_dir (str) – Path to image dataset.
  • file_refs_only (bool, default True) – Set to True to only store links to the files ( recommended. Otherwise it reads and stores the image files as well.

Adds information about corrected images to the corrupted dataset :param orig_images_dir: original images folder :param corrected_dir: corrected images folder

Parameters:filename (str) – Path to the pickle file.

static get_info_image_dataset(directory, file_refs_only)¶

Explores the image dataset in directory (assuming format described in section Data) and related information.

Parameters:
  • directory (str) – Directory of the dataset.
  • file_refs_only (bool) – Set to True to only store links to the files. Otherwise it reads and stores the image files as well (not recommended).
Returns:

List containing information of each image sample as a DataFrame.
Return type:

list
get_obs_time_from_frame_num(seq_no, frame_num)¶

Returns Timestamp object related to a missing frame (numeration starts from 0).

Parameters:
  • seq_no (int) – number of sequence
  • frame_num – number of image in sequence
Returns:
